title: Implement the Categories API
description: Create the complete categories router with CRUD endpoints and default category seeding.
instructions:
1. Create CategoryCreate and CategoryResponse Pydantic schemas
2. Implement GET /categories (list user's categories)
3. Implement POST /categories (create custom category)
4. Implement DELETE /categories/{id} (delete only non-default categories)
5. Add validation to prevent deleting categories with transactions
